Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [ES_INDEXEDQUEUE_INDEX_1] ON [innovator].[ES_INDEXQUEUE] ( [INDEXED_ID] ASC, [OPERATION_TYPE] ASC, [ROOT_ID] ASC, [STATUS] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON)
Item.name: ES_INDEXEDQUEUE_INDEX_1
